title: Person of Interest Season 3 Comic-Con 2013: Highlight Reel
author: TVweb
comment: Love this show!!  I love Root and Elias!
A lot of this is season 2, and there's no way they would've spoiled Beecher's death in a Comic Con teaser.
Root is wonderfully played. She deserves her own series.
God I can't wait for this
